semantics.label: Introduction text
semantics.description: Will be displayed above the summary task.

fields.label: List of statements for the summary - the first statement is correct.
Define custom feedback for any score range
fields.description: Click the "Add range" button to add as many ranges as you need. Example: 0-20% Bad score, 21-91% Average Score, 91-100% Great Score!

semantics.label: Text displayed before number of statements solved in the summary task.
semantics.description: Will be displayed above the statements. Example: 'Progress: 2/5'

semantics.label: Text displayed before number of wrong statements selected in the summary task.
semantics.default: ចម្លើយមិនត្រឹមត្រូវ:
semantics.description: Will be displayed above the statements. Example: 'Wrong answers: 4'

semantics.label: Summary feedback header
semantics.default: លទ្ធផលរបស់អ្នក
semantics.description: Will be displayed above the summary feedback.

semantics.label: Readspeaker text for correct answer
semantics.default: ត្រឹមត្រូវ

semantics.label: Readspeaker text for announcing incorrect answer
semantics.default: មិនត្រឹមត្រូវ! សូមសាកម្តងទៀត។

semantics.label: Readspeaker label for incorrect answer
semantics.default: មិនត្រឹមត្រូវ

semantics.label: Label list of correct answers
semantics.default: ចម្លើយត្រឹមត្រូវ

semantics.label: Label for the show tip button
semantics.default: បង្ហាញគន្លឹះ

semantics.label: Textual representation of the score bar for those using a readspeaker
semantics.description: :num and :total are special keywords which are programmatically updated
semantics.default: អ្នកទទួលបានពិន្ទុ :num លើ :total

semantics.label: Text used for readspeakers to communicate progress
semantics.description: :num and :total are special keywords which are programmatically updated
semantics.default: វឌ្ឍនភាព៖ :num ចំណោម :total
